TextView.android:text: THE BOOK BASED ON THIS APP, FOCUSING ON BUSINESS IDEAS AND STARTING YOUR BUSINESS

Dear friends,


Let me tell you the story of this app. When I first built it, I provided free help to every user of the app who asked for help. I spent countless hours helping people from different countries, and with different businesses. I became friends and stayed in touch with many of them. After a while, this app became one of the top business apps on Android, and I was not able to help everyone who asked for help simply because too many people were asking for help.


So I had to make help a paid feature. But by that time, I had helped over 1,000 people. And to date, over 300,000 people have benefited from my apps. And I am extremely excited to announce that I wrote a book that covers all the questions that people have asked me during my conversations with the 1,000+ entrepreneurs whom I personally helped (with all privacy preserved).


Since the book was written based on the cumulative experience of all the entrepreneurs who came before you, I almost guarantee that it covers many of the issues you are curious about yourself.
And the print version of the book is available on Amazon.com
